string.text:
A string instrument widely used throughout the Zone to raise spirits and fraternize.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Recreational
 %c[d_orange] • %c[ui_gray_2] Playable

For blues and prison romance lovers.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Recreational
 %c[d_orange] • %c[ui_gray_2] Playable

Containing fabric, sewing needles and a few leather strips primarily used as a means to stop bleeding and treat lacerations.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_green] • %c[pda_white] Post-heals: T(8)%c[pda_white]•••••••• %c[pda_white]A(3)%c[pda_white]••• %c[pda_white]L(3)%c[pda_white]•••

An old, classic Soviet watch. It's not surprising that many stalkers prefer mechanical watches over PDAs for time checking as these are reliable and durable even in the worst of situations. Simple hand watches come in handy when PDAs fail due to strong electromagnetic waves from emissions or nearby anomalous fields.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[ui_gray_2] Use to check the time

A type of peening hammer used in metalworking.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Basic Material

A broken Bear detector. The screen is smashed and the interior seems to be in quite bad shape though some of the electronic parts inside are still safe.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Basic Material

A worn out and broken flashlight.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Basic Material

Commonly used in situations that require a strong, flexible, and very sticky tape. An easy and temporary solution for quick repair jobs.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Basic Material

A 12mL medical syringe. With a drug-making kit and proper knowledge, this syringe can come in handy for the creation of various types of drugs.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Basic Material

A spoon, knife and fork made of heavy steel. A robust and reasonably light cutlery set, ideal for backpacking and field exploration.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Basic Material

Grease is a semi-solid lubricant. It generally consists of a soap emulsified with mineral or vegetable oil. Greases are applied to mechanisms that cannot be lubricated constantly or where typical lubricating oil would not stay in position.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Basic Material

A tiny plastic jar. Such jars are always handy for keeping small items safe, especially drugs and medicines as it protects the contents from moisture or other airborne contaminants.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Basic Material

A good rope of about 10-meters in length. Serves many purposes, especially in a place like the Zone.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Basic Material

Music is a good way to calm your nerves, but this radio is of little use with a broken antenna.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Basic Material

A bundle of strands of very fine soft steel filaments used as an abrasive in finishing and repair work.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Basic Material

A small mirror mounted on a telescopic iron tube. A handy item used by fighters versed in the arts of urban combat.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Basic Material

A guide on survival techniques when out in the field. Some stalkers may want to take a look for educational purposes.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:

The display is dead and there is a constant hiss from the speaker indicating that this is of no use.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Basic Material

Welding goggles with an old leather band. Designed to provide eye protection while welding or cutting though the wear and tear on these suggest they would do neither.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Basic Material

These batteries have been completely drained of whatever energy they once had.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:

A luxury item in the Zone. Having a sleeping bag and a bed spread may prove essential if you don't want to hit the wall in the most inappropriate of circumstances.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:

A small radio in poor condition. Dirty and damaged by moisture, the interior seems to be in quite bad shape.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:

A large sheet of strong, flexible, water-resistant or waterproof material with reinforced grommets at the corners and along the sides to form attachment points for rope.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:

This notebook describes various drug deals in detail with specific nicknames, locations and time of meets. Some deals are executed through equipment exchanges and others are paid in large amounts of roubles. When browsing the pages, it becomes clear that Freedom is the main distributor of natural drugs such as marijuana. Bandits are producers and distributors of the more powerful (and dangerous) synthetic drugs like salicylic acid and cocaine.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:

Manual of industrial engineering. Some people read such books to expand their expertise and learn more about the facilities and factories in the Zone. Low sale value.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:

A pair of used leather boots.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:

A pair of used leather gloves.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:

Map-making kit containing a set of pens and measurement instruments, all in a waterproof and camouflaged cover of high quality.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:

Manual of mechanical engineering. Some people read such books to expand their expertise and learn more about the facilities and factories in the Zone.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:

Adolf Hitler's strategic memoirs collected in a single book. The book and all that it stands for are hated by many, which makes this an item of high symbolic value.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:

Maps showing the location of military camps around the Zone.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:

Hammer with a wooden handle and an iron head.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:

A leather-bound journal. Some of the pages are not yet used.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:

This photo of an unknown person, most likely a loved one.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:

100 pages worth of prime nude Russian girls. Common contraband among conscripts, criminals, and other unfortunates who are stuck in the Zone against their will.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:

A synthetic rope of around 5-meters in length. A good rope serves many purposes, especially in a place like the Zone.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:

This magazine is well-worn but still contains some glossy spreads of beautiful Slavic girls. Many of the pages have been torn out.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:

An extra pair of underwear could substantially increase your comfort. Unfortunately, this pair's history is unknown.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:

Spare parts for what looks to be an AKM assault rifle. The wooden parts are not in very good condition and the same can be said of the metal elements.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:

Playing cards are a popular pastime. The cover depicts the proud architectural design of the Moscow Metro.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Recreational
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Use: %c[ui_gray_2]Passing Time

A small box that contains finely crafted jewellery.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Junk

An old metal shovel used for various field purposes.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Junk

High-quality military shovel. Used for numerous field purposes.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Junk

An old, non-functional head lamp.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Junk
